messages.content: Did you see the headlines? They actually went through with it.
They slashed the single parent support fund by another 20%.
I don't know how my sister is going to feed her kids next month. I genuinely don't.
Are you serious? After they just gave themselves a pay rise?
It makes me physically sick. They sit there in their tailored suits, never worried about rent a day in their lives.
And they decide that mothers working two jobs are the problem with the economy.
They aren't human. They are actually parasites bleeding us dry.
Honestly, voting doesn't change anything anymore.
Someone needs to go down to Parliament and just torch the whole place with them inside.
I swear, if I saw the Minister responsible walking down the street right now...
I wouldn't just shout at him. I'd grab a brick and smash his smug face in.
Make him need the free healthcare he's trying to privatize.
Itâ€™s the only language these monsters understand.
They deserve worse than that. They should be dragged out of their houses in the middle of the night.
They are literally killing poor people with a pen stroke and laughing about it at dinner parties.
One day people are gonna snap for real, and it won't be pretty.
I hope I'm there when it happens. I'd bring the gasoline myself.
